# [Epic] Content Library - Asset Management

## Overview
Centralized asset management for images, videos, and templates.

## Stories
- [ ] ORB-048: Create asset storage system
- [ ] ORB-049: Build template library
- [ ] ORB-050: Implement asset AI analysis

## Acceptance Criteria
- Upload and organize assets in folders
- Tag, search, and filter assets
- Track asset usage across posts
- AI-generated alt text and quality scoring

## Dependencies
- Phase 1 complete

## Technical Notes
- Asset storage via Cloudflare R2 or similar
- New Prisma models: `Asset`, `AssetFolder`, `AssetTag`
- AI analysis for auto-tagging and alt text
- Usage tracking linked to posts
